name: Halloween: Graveyard Edition
description:
COMMENT YOUR SCORE!!!!!!

Early Access: Halloween Graveyard edition Collect as much as you can

Download then Unzip File to get Started! Halloween collecting game in very early access.  Glowing Purple bars are worth 1,  Pumpkins are worth 5 points!.

Dev Log Add Ons:

Third Person View,   Option Menu, Produced Background Music, Exit Options in Game and in Ending Movie view, LeaderBoards

Please comment below and add ons we should make!
